game.engine.system

Class Game2DSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • javax.swing.JApplet
              • game.engine.system.Game2DSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer

    public class Game2DSystem
extends javax.swing.JApplet
    GameSystem of this game engine this class includes 1. main loop of the game 2. handle key input method , and we support web by extending JApplet
    Author:
    Hendry
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
